commanderPerk.description: Increases <WeaponClass>Hardware</> <ModifiedAttribute>Impact</> by <Number>1.42</>. abilities.name: Goin' Constructor
abilities.description: Equip a hammer which deals [Damage.Value] physical damage per hit and a shield that grants [Ability.Line2] Armor, and Taunts nearby enemies while it is raised. Gain [Ability.Line3] base armor. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds. At the end of the ability, explode, knocking back enemies.

abilities.name: DECOY
abilities.description: Deploy a D.E.C.O.Y. which distracts nearby enemies for [Ability.Duration] seconds. Does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.description: Charge forward [Ability.Distance] tiles, dealing [Damage.Value] physical damage to enemies and pushing them away with your shield.
